attributes.action: Promote Equal Racialism - Promotion of black people into positions of power.
attributes.additional_details:
-Latest government research have shown that black people are 4%more likely to commit crimes more than their white counterparts
-17.6% are most likely to be stopped and searched for unknown reasons
-Black students are more likely to be permanent excluded from school than White students

These worrying facts make us question how much the government does to improve racial equality among communities and schools.
attributes.background: Why have we not ever had a Black Prime Minister? Sadly this is a harsh reality. So what are the Government doing to promote Equal opportunities for all races?.Black students do not always have a positive role model to aspire to be.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about racial equality but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like taken.
